pages.text: You can use fancy shapes to make more accurate selections

$(li)$(l)//sel poly$()$(br) Left click will be first point, then every right click adds more points to selection $(br)$(li)$(l)//sel convex$()$(br) Left click is first point, each right click adds more points.  Useful for selecting 3D shapes $(br)$(li)$(l)//sel cuboid$()$(br) Return to basic cuboid selection mode
